classification_data.text: COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA CERTIFICACIÓN DEL CONTADOR PÚBLICO El suscrito Contador Público de LA EMPRESA ROMEGAS SAS., identificada con NIT 900.127.447 - 1, hace constar que, de acuerdo con el libro oficial de registro de accionistas, inscrito en el registro mercantil, CERTIFICA QUE: La composición accionaria es la siguiente: Se expide a los veinticinco (31) días del mes de mayo de 2023 Cordialmente, LAURA I. OVIEDO GOMEZ TP 304428 – T CONTADORA PÚBLICA DOCUMENTO ACCIONISTAS % PARTICIPACION ACCIONES SUSCRITAS VALOR NOMINAL CC. 79.735.871 JULIO CESAR ROMERO MUÑOZ 100% 2.000 $10.000 TOTAL 100% 2.000 $10.000

content.thinking: Let me analyze this document according to the classification workflow: 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** The document is a certificate of shareholder composition ("COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA") for a company called ROMEGAS SAS. The document is issued by a public accountant (Laura I. Oviedo Gomez) and contains details about the shareholder structure of the company. It shows that Julio Cesar Romero Muñoz holds 100% of the shares (2,000 shares with a nominal value of $10,000 each). 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** - BLANK: No, the document has meaningful content. - LINK_ONLY: No, the document contains substantive content not just links. 3. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** The document is issued by a public accountant (Contador Público), not a government entity like DIAN or Chamber of Commerce. 4. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS** This document's function is to certify the ownership structure and shareholder composition of the company ROMEGAS SAS. It specifically shows ownership percentages, number of shares, and nominal value. 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** Let me evaluate the document against the possible categories: - CECRL: No, this is not a personal identification document. - RUT: No, this is not a tax registration document issued by DIAN. - CERL: No, this is not a certificate of legal existence issued by a Chamber of Commerce. - ACC: Yes, this document clearly shows the shareholder structure with ownership percentages, number of shares, and nominal values. - RUB: No, this is not a beneficial ownership report issued by DIAN. - POR_REVISAR: Not needed, as we have a clear match with ACC. 6. **CONFIDENCE VALIDATION** This document has strong evidence for the ACC category: - It has the explicit title "COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA" (Shareholder Composition) - It includes shareholder terminology: "accionistas", "composición accionaria" - It provides ownership data in multiple formats: - Ownership percentage (100%) - Number of shares (2,000) - Capital/nominal value ($10,000) - It identifies the owner with name and ID number - It is certified by a public accountant The document's primary purpose is clearly to certify the ownership structure of the company, which is the defining characteristic of the ACC category. Based on this analysis, I classify this document as ACC (Shareholder Composition Certificate). The complete extracted text (with proper JSON escaping) is: "COMPOSICION ACCIONARIA CERTIFICACIÓN DEL CONTADOR PÚBLICO El suscrito Contador Público de LA EMPRESA ROMEGAS SAS., identificada con NIT 900.127.447 - 1, hace constar que, de acuerdo con el libro oficial de registro de accionistas, inscrito en el registro mercantil, CERTIFICA QUE: La composición accionaria es la siguiente: Se expide a los veinticinco (31) días del mes de mayo de 2023 Cordialmente, LAURA I.
